name: Election Balls
description:
Election game. (exit-poll version). All people vote to elephant or donkey. You could vote using our app via play and game.

Initially cost of your vote is equal 1 cent. To count your vote you should complete election ball play level. If you collect all voter balls you will increase valuable of you vote. But level of election ball game will increase also. Nobody cross level 40 yet.

Also you can see result of exit-poll in our funny app.

Good luck and enjoy.
